NORTH SEA.
ENGLAND.
DNC 20.
1. CABLE OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY CABLESHIP CONNECTOR AND M/V LANGE WRAPPER
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   53-31.9N 000-02.2E, 53-47.5N 001-38.6E,
   53-45.3N 001-40.2E, 53-25.5N 000-13.6E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1652/18.
